review: My Order was placed August 1, I received the Chromecast on September 10th. It was back-ordered so that's understandable. However, the unit I have never worked right. Streaming for my pc, my iphone, my ipad, my sons laptop - works for a short time, then the Chromecaster reboots/resets itself.It could be iTunes, YouTube or anything cast from Chrome itself using the tab-cast method. Same results regardless. Works for a bit (5 or 10 minutes) - then boom - reboot. And once the reboots happen, it seems to shorten the time until hit happens again.I called customer service and at first they were very helpful. Trying any number of things, resets, moving it to a different hdmi port on the tv, moving it to another tv. But none of this helps. It still happens.And the customer server has gotten worse and worse. At first they stayed on the line and waited for the result - then they moved it to emails, where I had to wait days if not longer in between replies and those replies were useless, suggesting things that had already been tried or demanding things like proof of purchase and then not replying for a week after it's provided.I would have sent it back and gotten a replacement but they were still back ordered in September and I figured Google would actually take care of their customer. I guess that was my mistake.Here I am, a month later and no resolution. No response from customer service and no working chromecast.
author: Thomas S Flanagan

review: I love this device. I think my favorite part is being able to search for specific titles on my phone and send them straight to my HDTV. This is way easier than using an arrow on a TV or console remote to navigate through an onscreen menu.Scrubbing forward and back on a movie could be better. It's hard to go forward or back only a minute or two or stop on exactly the right spot.

review: I bought this to stream from my devices to my TV/Stereo system.  The Chromecast only work with a few apps and even fewer on iOS.  If you're trying to stream music from your iPad or iPhone to your stereo system or stream movies from your iOS apps it will NOT work.  The only thing that's of any use that works is Netflix streaming, which I already had through either computer hooked up to the TV, Roku, etc.Chromecast's limited appeal doesn't do it for me and it's going in the junk drawer.

So far as I know the only things that cast are Netflix and Youtube.. I wish that it would cast ANYthing and EVERYthing I wanted it to. It works great so far.
